name: Billy (itch) (TechNetic Dev)
description:
DESCRIPTION

Meet Billy, Your companion for a tour of a facility. This facility is packed wiht secrets and suprises waiting to be uncovered. Find All Four Endings with Billy by your side!

Any bugs you find please comment in the community page for fixing!

If we can get this game on speedrun.com that would be amazing!

Music By Context Sensitive https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCT1ZkP03V18LmOj8zbyP-Dw CONTROLS

WASD Keys Move Around OR Arrow Keys

Space Bar to Jump, Space bar in Midair to Dash in the Direction you're facing

Left Mouse Click to use Buttons

Ram yourself into Billy to knock him over lol
